alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 09 at 11:46AM EST by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong showers will impact portions of Eastern Miami-Dade County through 1230 PM EST... At 1144 AM EST, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong showers along a line extending from Westchester to 8 miles east of Black Point. Movement was south southwest at 25 mph and will affect the eastern Metro areas of Miami-Dade County. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miami, Hialeah, Miami Beach, Homestead, Coral Gables, Key Biscayne, South Miami, Surfside, Homestead Miami Speedway, Black Point, Miami Gardens, Turkey Point, Virginia Key, Kendall, North Miami, Doral, North Miami Beach, Aventura, Sunny Isles Beach and Pinecrest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
